world.entity.ship

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.entity.Entity
      • world.entity.ship.Ship
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IShip

    public class Ship
extends Entity
implements IShip
    A class of ships involving its position, velocity, direction, speed limit and shape.

      • Ship

        public Ship(Direction direction,
    Position position,
    double speedLimit,
    Velocity velocity,
    CircleShape shape,
    Mass mass)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
            java.lang.NullPointerException
        Initializes this new ship with a given direction, position, shape, mass, speed limit and velocity.
        Parameters:
        direction - The given direction.
        position - The given position.
        speedLimit - The given speed limit.
        velocity - The given velocity
        shape - The given circle shape
        mass - The given mass
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - | The given shape is not a legal shape.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - | Any of the parameters is null.

      • canHaveAsShape

        protected boolean canHaveAsShape(CircleShape shape)
        Description copied from class: Entity
        Checks whether this ship can have the given shape as its shape.
        Overrides:
        canHaveAsShape in class Entity
        Parameters:
        shape - The shape to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given shape is not null and has a range of at least the minimum radius for ships. | result = (shape != null)
        See Also:
        Entity.canHaveAsShape(world.physics.geometry.CircleShape)
